description.narrative: The objective of the project is to develop sustainable systems and capacities within the MAFWM to ensure timely compliance with EU acquis conditions in the rural sector.

condition.narrative: Administrative Service Agreement, satisfactory to the Bank, has been duly executed by the Borrower and HAMAG
Livestock/Nitrates Management technical specialist shall have been appointed to the PIU under terms of reference and withqualifications satisfactory to the Bank
Monitoring and Evaluation contractor will design a simple Management Information System for M&E, reporting formats for eachcomponent, incl. targeted annual performance objectives and mon.ind.
Operational Guidelines, acceptable to the Bank, have been approved by MAFWM
Project Steering Committee would be established to provide overall project oversight, advice and assistance in resolving issuesassociated with project implementation
Recipient and CAEI shall adopt and sign the final version of the AWPB in the form approved by the Bank not later than December 31of each fiscal year
